name: Share
description: Use the system's share functionality to share something via another app.

conditions.name: Is supported
conditions.description: Test if the sharing actions are supported on this platform.

conditions.name: On share completed
conditions.description: Triggered after the user completes a share. Note this does not necessarily mean anything was shared.

conditions.name: On share failed
conditions.description: Triggered if a share is not completed successfully or an error occurs.

conditions.name: Is sharing files supported
conditions.description: Test if sharing files via the 'Add file' action is supported on this platform.

actions.name: Share
actions.description: Share some text with an optional title and URL, and any files that were previously added.

params.name: Text
params.description: The message to share. Leave empty to omit.

params.name: Title
params.description: The title or subject of the share. Leave empty to omit.

params.name: URL
params.description: A URL to share. Leave empty to omit.

actions.name: Add file
actions.description: Add the contents of a Binary Data object as a file to attach to the next share. Note only works if 'Is sharing files supported' is true.

params.name: Filename
params.description: Name of the file to add.

params.name: Type
params.description: Content type (also known as MIME type) of the file to add.

params.name: Data
params.description: A Binary Data object to use as the content of the file.

actions.name: Request app rating
actions.description: Display a dialog requesting the user to rate your application.
actions.display_text: Request app rating (body: [i]{0}[/i], confirm: [i]{1}[/i], cancel: [i]{2}[/i], app ID: [i]{3}[/i])

params.name: Dialog Text
params.description: The body text of the request review dialog (Android with no Google Play Store App only).

params.name: Confirm Button Text
params.description: The text of the "confirm" button on the request review dialog (Android with no Google Play Store App only).

params.name: Cancel Button Text
params.description: The text of the "cancel" button on the request review dialog (Android with no Google Play Store App only).

params.name: App ID
params.description: The app ID to request a rating for (Android with no Google Play Store App only). Leave empty to use the project's app ID.

actions.name: Display store page
actions.description: Open the 'rate app' store page for an app.
actions.display_text: Display store page for app ID [i]{0}[/i]

params.name: App ID
params.description: The app ID of the store page to open. Leave empty to use the project's app ID.
